FuncDef: The display dfs-group stp command displays STP information about all nodes in a DFS group. The display dfs-group stp command displays STP information about all nodes in a DFS group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a DFS group.
The value is 1.

Specifies the ID of a node.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 2.

Specifies the ID of an M-LAG.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 2048.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display dfs-group 1 node 1 stp m-lag 1 brief
ExtraInfo: You can run the display dfs-group stp command to check STP information about all nodes in a DFS group or STP information about an M-LAG user-side interface.
